name: Bangladesh Airlines Training Center (BATC)
about: Bangladesh Airlines Training Center (BATC), established in 1972, is the official training centre of Biman Bangladesh Airlines and the only EASA Part-147 approved Aircraft Maintenance Training Organization in the region. Located near Hazrat Shahjalal International Airport, BATC provides comprehensive aviation training to officials, crew, and pilots of Biman and other national and international airlines. The center offers a wide range of courses, including airline transport pilot licenses, type technical training for various aircraft, and specialized training in operations, engineering, customer service, and management development. With state-of-the-art facilities such as a radio and electronics lab, aircraft systems lab, and a Fokker-28 aircraft for training, BATC aims to emerge as a regional aviation training hub, adhering to the highest standards set by ICAO, CAAB, and EASA. BATC is dedicated to creating a centre of excellence in aviation training.
